labels.heading: Sorry, there is a problem with the service. Try again later.
labels.content: If the problem continues, call the UK Chemicals Helpline and quote the following error code:

labels.contactHelpLine: If the web address is correct or you selected a link or button, contact the UK Chemicals Helpline.
labels.helplineSubHeading: Have the error code with you when you call the helpline.
labels.helplineAvailability: Monday to Friday, 8.30am to 5pm (except public holidays)
